description:
Ronnie is a 20-year-old guy who is gay. He became interesting in doing a video when a friend of his went to work for a major studio.
"So do you want to be a big porn star?" I asked him.
"No, I just want to have a little fun. Maybe see how it goes," he replied.
"So after this what do you think you want to do?"
"I wouldn't mind going down on an older guy," he replied.
Now, I know that to a guy who's 20 someone who is 26 is considered "old."
"Really? You like older guys?" I asked.
"Yeah, they're more experienced. I especially like it if they're muscular or hairy."
"Are you a top or a bottom?" I asked.
"I'm about 50/50."
I'm guessing that he's a bottom...
title: Ronnie
